mapper.select: SELECT B.OWNER, B.DCODE, B.GCODE, B.TCODE, B.PCODE, D.IMGNAME AS DIMGNAME, T.IMGNAME AS TIMGNAME FROM BACKPACK B LEFT OUTER JOIN DOSIRAK D ON B.DCODE = D.DCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TICKET T ON B.TCODE = T.TCODE WHERE B.OWNER LIKE #{owner}
mapper.update: UPDATE BACKPACK SET DCODE = 0 WHERE OWNER LIKE #{owner}
UPDATE BACKPACK SET TCODE = 0 WHERE OWNER LIKE #{owner}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BACKPACK (OWNER, DCODE, TCODE) VALUES ('${param1}', ${param2}, ${param3})
mapper.update: UPDATE BACKPACK SET DCODE = ${param2} WHERE OWNER LIKE '${param1}'
UPDATE BACKPACK SET TCODE = ${param2} WHERE OWNER LIKE '${param1}'
